recipes.name: Feijoada
instructions: Soak black beans overnight
Brown all meats in large pot
Add beans, onions, and bay leaves
Cover with water and simmer 2 hours
Season with salt and pepper
Serve with rice and orange slices

recipes.name: Moqueca Baiana
instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice and salt
Layer onions, tomatoes, and peppers in pot
Add fish, pour over coconut milk and palm oil
Simmer gently until fish is cooked through
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice

recipes.name: PÃ£o de Queijo
instructions: Heat milk and oil, pour over tapioca flour
Mix in eggs and cheese, form small balls
Bake at 375Â°F (190Â°C) for 20-25 minutes until golden

recipes.name: Brigadeiro
instructions: Combine condensed milk, cocoa, and butter in saucepan
Cook over medium heat, stirring, until thickened
Cool, roll into balls, coat with sprinkles

recipes.name: VatapÃ¡
instructions: Soak bread in coconut milk, blend with peanuts, onion, tomato, and garlic
Cook mixture with dried shrimp and palm oil until thickened
Serve hot with rice or acarajÃ©

recipes.name: AcarajÃ©
instructions: Soak and peel black-eyed peas, blend with onion and salt
Shape into balls, deep-fry in palm oil until golden
Split and fill with dried shrimp and vatapÃ¡ if desired

recipes.name: Coxinha
instructions: Boil chicken in broth, shred and mix with cream cheese
Make dough with broth, flour, and butter
Shape dough around filling, dip in egg and breadcrumbs
Deep-fry until golden

recipes.name: Farofa
instructions: Fry bacon and onion in butter
Add cassava flour, toast until golden
Season with salt and serve

recipes.name: Quindim
instructions: Mix all ingredients, pour into molds
Bake in water bath at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 40-45 minutes
Cool and unmold

recipes.name: Pastel
instructions: Make dough with flour, water, and oil
Roll out, fill with beef and onion, fold and seal
Fry until golden and crisp

recipes.name: Bolo de Rolo
instructions: Cream butter and sugar, add eggs, then flour
Spread thin layers, bake, spread guava paste, roll up
Repeat for multiple layers

recipes.name: Caldo Verde
instructions: Cook potatoes and onion in water until soft
Blend, return to pot, add kale and chorizo
Simmer and drizzle with olive oil

recipes.name: EmpadÃ£o
instructions: Make dough with flour, butter, and eggs
Fill with chicken, peas, corn, and tomato sauce
Bake at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 45-50 minutes

recipes.name: Canjica
instructions: Cook corn in water until soft
Add milk, condensed milk, cinnamon, and sugar
Simmer until thick and creamy

recipes.name: Escondidinho de Carne Seca
instructions: Boil cassava, mash with butter and milk
SautÃ© onion and carne seca, layer in baking dish
Top with mashed cassava and cheese, bake until golden

recipes.name: Tapioca
instructions: Heat nonstick pan, sprinkle tapioca flour to form a disk
Cook until set, add butter and cheese, fold and serve

recipes.name: Arroz Carreteiro
instructions: SautÃ© onion, sausage, and beef
Add tomato and bell pepper, then rice
Add water, cook until rice is tender

recipes.name: BaiÃ£o de Dois
instructions: Cook beans until tender
SautÃ© bacon, sausage, and onion
Add rice and beans, cook together
Stir in cheese before serving

recipes.name: Caruru
instructions: SautÃ© onion in palm oil
Add okra, cook until slimy texture reduces
Add shrimp, peanuts, and cashews, simmer until thick

recipes.name: Picanha na Brasa
instructions: Season steak with salt
Grill over charcoal until desired doneness
Slice and serve

recipes.name: Doce de Leite
instructions: Simmer milk and sugar, stirring constantly, until thick and caramel-colored
Cool and cut into pieces

recipes.name: Bolinho de Chuva
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, eggs, milk, and baking powder
Drop spoonfuls into hot oil, fry until golden
Roll in cinnamon sugar

recipes.name: Manjar Branco
instructions: Mix all ingredients, cook over medium heat until thick
Pour into mold, chill until set

recipes.name: Moela ao Molho
instructions: SautÃ© onion and garlic in oil
Add gizzards, brown well
Add tomatoes and sauce, simmer until tender

recipes.name: Cuscuz Paulista
instructions: SautÃ© onion and tomato, add tuna, peas, and olives
Add cornmeal and water, cook until thick
Press into mold with egg slices, cool and unmold

recipes.name: Pudim de Leite Condensado
instructions: Make caramel with sugar, pour into mold
Blend condensed milk, milk, and eggs, pour over caramel
Bake in water bath at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 90 minutes, chill before serving

recipes.name: Moqueca Capixaba
instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice and salt
Layer onions, tomatoes, and peppers in clay pot
Add fish, drizzle with olive oil
Simmer gently until fish is cooked through
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice

recipes.name: Bolo de FubÃ¡
instructions: Mix all ingredients, pour into greased pan
Bake at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 35-40 minutes
Cool and slice

recipes.name: FeijÃ£o Tropeiro
instructions: Fry bacon, sausage, onion, and garlic
Add beans, stir in eggs, scramble
Mix in cassava flour, cook until crumbly

recipes.name: Curau de Milho
instructions: Blend corn and milk, strain
Cook with sugar and butter until thick
Pour into bowls, sprinkle with cinnamon

recipes.name: Tutu de FeijÃ£o
instructions: Fry bacon, onion, and garlic
Add beans, mash slightly
Stir in cassava flour and salt, cook until thick

recipes.name: Biscoito de Polvilho
instructions: Mix all ingredients, pipe onto baking sheet
Bake at 350Â°F (175Â°C) for 20-25 minutes until crisp

recipes.name: CamarÃ£o na Moranga
instructions: Bake pumpkin until soft, scoop out some flesh
SautÃ© onion and tomato, add shrimp, cook briefly
Mix with cream cheese and coconut milk, fill pumpkin, bake again

recipes.name: Galinhada
instructions: Brown chicken, add onion, garlic, tomato, and pepper
Add rice and saffron, cover with water
Simmer until rice and chicken are cooked

recipes.name: PaÃ§oca de Amendoim
instructions: Grind peanuts, mix with sugar and salt
Press into molds, serve as candy

recipes.name: Canjiquinha
instructions: Brown pork ribs and bacon, add onion and garlic
Add cracked corn, bay leaf, and water
Simmer until corn and meat are tender
